content.rendered:
Get your

NFT E-marketplace or Metaverse

License in Dubai Now!
  • 100% Ownership
  • No Corporate Tax
  • Residency in UAE included

Get Started Today

Please share the details below
& let us call you back

Our Best Selling Packages

Silver

  • Company Registration
  • Articles of Association (AOA)
  • Company Licence
  • 1 Company Stamp
  • 1 Commemorative Certificate
  • Establishment Card
  • Special flexi desk (1 visa quota)
AED 45,999

Gold

  • Company Registration
  • Articles of Association (AOA)
  • Company Licence
  • 1 Company Stamp
  • 1 Commemorative Certificate
  • Establishment Card
  • Special flexi desk (1 visa quota)
  • Introduction to the Banker
  • Assistance in one residence
  • visa stamping
AED 54,999

Platinum

  • Company Registration
  • Articles of Association (AOA)
  • Company Licence
  • 1 Company Stamp
  • 1 Commemorative Certificate
  • Establishment Card
  • Special flexi desk (3 visa quota)
  • Introduction to the Banker
  • Assistance in three residence
  • visa stamping
AED 63,999

The United Arab Emirates has long been considered a desirable destination for doing business. Dubai has become one of the biggest markets for crypto-asset platforms in the world.

The United Arab Emirates has long been considered a desirable destination for doing business. Dubai has become one of the biggest markets for crypto-asset platforms in the world.
At the same time, a surge in the buying, selling and creation of digital assets called NFTs — or Non-Fungible Tokens — is also taking place in the UAE.

If you wish to incorporate an NFT E-Marketplace/ Metaverse Service provider company in Dubai, DMCC offers the following activities.

NFTs E-Marketplace Provider

Includes firms engaged in providing an online platform for the buying & selling of third parties’ unique digital assets (NFTs) and facilitating commercial interactions between buyer and seller in return for a commission or remuneration. The online platform cannot be used to trade or promote crypto-commodities, cryptocurrencies, or NFTs covering any regulated products or securities.

Metaverse Service Provider

Includes firms engaged in the development and hosting of digital virtual environments, which enable simulated interactions between individuals. Companies with this activity are not permitted to issue tokens that are traded on exchanges or trade-in crypto commodities.

Why start-up in DMCC?

  • 0% Corporate tax and personal income tax.
  • 100% Business Ownership and Capital Repatriation.
  • Connected to 20,000+ members from various sectors and grow your business.
  • awarded Global Free Zone of the Year for a seventh consecutive year.
  • Flexible visas, medical services, flexi and serviced desks, furnished and serviced offices and so much more!
  • Close to global markets, major transportation and road networks.
